name: tia.sav
description:
Like many children, Isiah loved video games. Yet as he got older, everyone else grew out of them. Bullied and alone, he purchased the Portable Gaming System (PGS) in hopes of finding friends, only to find himself further ridicule.

Then, Tia stepped in his life – someone just like him. Staying up all night to trade characters, running after each other with their PGSs in hand and being glued to the TV in a heated competition became an everyday routine. Eventually, their love for video games turned into love for each other.

However after graduation, their paths diverged. Alone again, Isiah escapes into video games to save her in his own way.

He must survive a haunted prison, leap through a mystic forest, wage war against a kingdom, furnish the happiest home and fly through space: all for a chance to see her again.

Features
  • A lasting narrative
  • Multiple worlds with their own rules, games within a game
  • Homages to popular video games
  • A unique take on the turn-based battle system
  • Master classes, summons & the custom stat system
